Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie II
programme.desc: Inspektor Mazlan dan Inspektor Aleeza ditugaskan untuk menyiasat tentang satu sindiket penyeludapan dadah terbesar di Malaysia yang diketuai oleh seorang penjenayah yang bernama Raziman. Sindiket ini mempunyai berpuluh-puluh pengedar di seluruh negara dan dikaitkan dengan satu sindiket dadah antarabangsa.

programme.title: Playboy Dimindaku
programme.desc: Farid mempunyai banyak personaliti dan kekasih. Dia menggunakan personalitinya untuk berdepan dengan masalah dengan cara membiarkan personalitinya yang lain mengambil alih kekosongan yang dia tinggalkan itu.

programme.title: Demi Hati Arjuna
programme.desc: Alia disahkan menghidap penyakit hati Cirrhosis. Alia teringat masa silamnya memang liar. Bagi merawat penyakitnya, dia disaran melakukan transplan. Namun. Alia yang sebatang kara sukar untuk dia mendapatkan penderma. Dia kemudian teringat akan Arjuna, anak yang dia lahirkan 12 tahun dahulu bersama Zafran. Zafran tidak mahu bertanggungjawab. Anak itu diserahkan kepada orang lain selepas dinamakan sebagai Arjuna.

programme.title: Darah Satria
programme.desc: Ariff merupakan seorang pegawai berpangkat Leftenan Muda (ringkasan - LtM) dalam salah satu batalion dalam Rejimen Askar Melayu Di Raja. Dia sering terlibat dalam operasi memburu pengganas komunis di hutan belantara.

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Miss Bebek Makin Kesini Makin Meresahkan
programme.desc: Celin pada asalnya merupakan anak orang kaya, tetapi disebabkan keadaan, dia terpaksa menjadi penternak itik. Namun, seiring berjalannya waktu, dia semakin bersemangat dalam ternak itik kerana ada Bagas yang membantunya.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep168
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep6
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep45
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep125
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep161
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Bukan Main, Neng Kue Cubit Tajir Mendadak
programme.desc: Lebih suka hidup sederhana bersama ayahnya, Yulina terpaksa menjual kuih cubit.

programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: China Showbiz Ep163
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Report the Asia News on Asian view

programme.title: Memory of China Ep103
programme.desc: Memory of China is the first history program of China, the TV program unveils secrets of important historical events, mega projects and the untold stories behind those crucial decisions of this country.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep228
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Traces the current affairs from china and the world

programme.title: Walking around China Ep91
programme.desc: It focuses on the latest changes in China from a humanistic perspective, pays attention to new phenomena, new fashions, and new things around ordinary Chinese people,

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep459
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep5859
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each others back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep11
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep855856
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep683
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3384
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46784679
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep101102
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1837
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2073
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep957
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugos enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugos enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ais feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: In 1992, a heavy rainstorm caused a massive power outage in Hong Kong. Two young astrology enthusiasts, Moon and Sun, met on that starry night and fell in love. However, the path to love is not an easy one and they would need to endure parental objections and overcome challenges from teachers and friends.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: To Kill A Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: To Kill A Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: My Brothers
programme.desc: In this heart-warming Irish road movie, three young brothers take to the streets in a stolen bakery van to replace their dying fathers watch. Headed for Ballybunion, they are quickly side-tracked by a medley of hilarious mishaps and quirky oddballs.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart
programme.desc: When Giulios fiance cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiance taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Sebbe
programme.desc: Sebbe is fifteen. He never planned to build a bomb but now, he has one in his hands. Growing up poor and with a single mother, life had always been difficult. The junkyard soon became his place of refuge where he could detach himself from the world.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Wayfarer
programme.desc: Thomas Bareski is a wandering, nature-loving ex-cop who lives out of his van and his lifes mission is to help solve some of Frances 310 unsolved murders. He arrives in Montallier to investigate his first case the disappearance of a young girl.

programme.title: The Traveller: Midnight Mayhem
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead in the Arles region, tied up and naked on a pile of wood. Bareski believes this murder is linked to that of two other women killed in 2021 and 2017. He is not alone in the hunt for the killer. An enigmatic woman joins him.

programme.title: Mokhtar

You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 01
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground in New York in the twelfth season premiere.Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny discover they're uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents.

programme.desc: Sheldon considers dropping out of college to focus on building his database. Also, George Sr. is frustrated when someone else gets credit for his football wins.

programme.desc: Pull back the curtain on 20 of the dumbest performers ever to take the stage - from an angry Elmo to a lion trainer who almost becomes dinner and a woman who crushes watermelons. programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep1
programme.desc: An all-American candy company makes 200,000 packages of red licorice every day; a zippy mayonnaise packs the punch of spicy Sriracha; 40,000 Turkish bourekas are produced every day; and Laceys feature a chocolate centre sandwiched between two wafer-thin cookies.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep2
programme.desc: 1.8 million cherry chews are produced from just one single batch; massive silos of wheat are transformed into 'elbow' macaroni pasta; a continental cranberry cheesecake first started as a Christmas experiment; and meet chakri, the exotic southeast Asian snack that's hand-twirled and fried to crispy perfection.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Volcano - A look at how without volcanoes, there would be no life on Earth. Although destructive, magma from the planet's molten core builds land, and mineral-rich ash from eruptions fertilises the surface.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia - Joanna Lumley begins her epic journey in Indonesia.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Ridge of Fire Part 1 - An inconspicuous hill on the Spanish Island of La Palma bursts open, releasing an avalanche of lava. In its path are the homes of seven thousand residents and the emergency services rush to evacuate. Within twenty-four hours, volcano expert Chris Horsley is on the scene.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brazil - Robson Green heads to exotic world locations to challenge locals at catching some of the strangest fish. In this episode he heads to Brazil.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hot Springs Pack - Meet a close-knit family of wild dogs who work together to raise pups and hunt enough food to feed the whole pack. While their well-coordinated hunts are successful, the wet season brings challenges when some of the team strikes out on their own.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Heir to the Clan - Spotty, a female hyena cub, is destined to be leader of the Chimbwe clan that lives in the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley. But she has yet to prove herself. Witness her fight to find her place in this savagely competitive family.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Goby Effect - The Lake Erie Watersnake is currently on the brink of extinction, and researchers have been fighting to get it back. And it looks like it's finally working - thanks to the round goby. Grad student Lizzy Mack is heading out on day trips to catch bucket loads of the snakes, collect measurements, and inject them with small microchips to track them along their way, all while dodging bites from some of the crankiest snakes around.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealands South Island, where one of the worlds longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Bad Reputations - Where animals and humans co-exist, how do you stop a bad reputation from pushing a species towards extinction? From rattlesnakes to cormorants, see how creatures that have bad reputations are being dealt with when it comes to conservation.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nature's Crossroads - Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hot Springs Pack - Meet a close-knit family of wild dogs who work together to raise pups and hunt enough food to feed the whole pack. While their well-coordinated hunts are successful, the wet season brings challenges when some of the team strikes out on their own.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Heir to the Clan - Spotty, a female hyena cub, is destined to be leader of the Chimbwe clan that lives in the heart of Zambias Luangwa Valley. But she has yet to prove herself. Witness her fight to find her place in this savagely competitive family.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Damning Truth - A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where theyre not welcome.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Thailand: the River Basin - Although the Mekong runs down Thailands far eastern border, the influence of the rivers basin reaches across nearly half the country. The east of Thailand is characterized by a complex network of the Mekongs tributaries. These waterways are the foundation of life for many different ecosystems; from extensive rice fields to large pockets of tropical rainforest.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Waterhole - While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Creatures of the Night - Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Back from the Dead - Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - Theres strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, its the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Horses of the Sun - Grvys zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we arent vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia: Hidden Refuges - Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep91
programme.desc: Fifi's Happy Day - Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep92
programme.desc: Fly High Primrose - Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep93
programme.desc: Lovelorn Slugsy - Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi's Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of itchyfootitis, so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the condition begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire itchy foot clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep15
programme.desc: Why Porcupine Has Quills - You see there was a time when Porcupine didn't have quills, she had the softest coat in all of Tinga Tinga and Jackal wanted it. Despite warnings from all the animals Porcupine allows Jackal to invite her to his cave to keep out of the rain. Porcupine takes off her coat to allow it to dry, but while she sleeps naughty Jackal runs off with it. When she awakes Porcupine is covered in lots of tiny ant bites and they itch and they itch and they itch. Tortoise suggests Elephant squeeze some milk from the Milky Quill bush but Porcupine can't wait anymore and runs into the Quill bushes to relieve her itching. Crash! Crash! Crash! Porcupine crashes through the Quill bushes and emerges covered in spikey quills! The animals can't believe their eyes! But Porcupine is delighted as no beast will ever come near her sensitive skin ever again! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep58
programme.desc: Bad Year Blimp - King Julien and his team ride sharks to an Island; Clover and Sage get a map that leads to the wisdom they seek; Mort hides in Junk Harbor

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep61
programme.desc: Festival of Festivals - Lucky doesn't want her friends to miss their favorite Miradero traditions while they're away at school. So why not celebrate them all in one day?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fallen Star - When the brightest star in the sky falls, Noddy has to find it and work out how to get it back into its place in the sky before its light goes out forever. Will he manage in time for the fairies Sparkle party ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Annoying Butterflies - A strange new kind of butterfly is pestering the toys in Toyland just when the Queen organises a butterfly ball. Noddy has to find out what's going on fast !

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep34
programme.desc: Maximum Override / Gator's Giving - An overzealous librarian is after Archibald for an overdue library book. / Archibald volunteers to be the host of Cousin Ashleys beloved family holiday. But when Ashleys favorite cousin threatens to bail, Archibald works extra hard to make this the best holiday ever.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep97
programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep98
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Learning With Twinkle Ep1
